## Description {#details}

A single uniqued string.

These are used to efficiently contain a byte sequence for metadata. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdstring">MDString</a> is always unnamed.

Definition at line 724 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.
